text:
Wilbur T. Fitzgerald is an American actor and a practicing attorney in Georgia. He played Dist. Atty. Gerard Darnelle on the TV series In the Heat of the Night, 
Cray, the head peacekeeper in District 12, in The Hunger Games: Catching Fire, Dr. Milton Brangley in Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues and Bruce Bennett in the television show Prison Break.
